page.title: 19CHILDRENS GAMES
page.content: Barwick-in-Elmet. Football,Tennis,Chegging,Tig,Netball, Cricket,Tig-off-ground,Hot rice,Hot rice off ground,Ice-cream,Hopscotch, Poison,Glue pot,Non-stop cricket,Piggy back fights,Ball tig,Rounders,Block, Chase,Skipping,Cat and mouse,Snooker, Pink Elephant,Pacmuncher,Pretend games,Pegs,and Sharks and fishes. {Hot Rice.}This is a game where any number of people can play.One person is on and all the people have to avoid being hit by a tennis ball.They can defend themselves using their fists to knock it away. {Chegging}is a game where there are two lines one at each end of the playing space.One or as many as you like stand at each end of a playing space and throw the ball to the opposite end.
